data.title: SAQQARA: Stochastic gravitational wave background analysis
data.name: saqqara
data.description: A simulation-based Inference (SBI) library designed for stochastic gravitational wave background data analysis

evidence: "SAQQARA is a Simulation-based Inference (SBI) library designed to perform analysis on stochastic gravitational wave (background) signals (SGWB)."
"If you use SAQQARA in your analysis, or find it useful, we would ask that you please consider citing the following works."
"Release Details: - v0.0.2 | *August 2024* | Update with refactored, modular saqqara package... - v0.0.1 | *September 2023* | Public release matching companion paper"
